snippet: CSX Corp. (CSX) said Tuesday its second-quarter profit chugged ahead 2 percent as the economy continued to improve, so the railroad is investing an additional $100 million in its network....

headline.print_headline: CSX Railroad's 2Q Profit Chugs Ahead 2 Percent
headline.main: CSX Railroad's 2Q Profit Chugs Ahead 2 Percent

lead_paragraph: CSX Corp. (CSX) said Tuesday its second-quarter profit chugged ahead 2 percent as the economy continued to improve, so the railroad is investing an additional $100 million in its network.
